title: Bug 18705 - Excessive Flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is experiencing frequent flashing. Investigate the cause.
OB: The entire frame is being repainted, leading to excessive flashing.
EB: Optimize the repainting process to refresh only the bottom edge of the outermost frames, eliminating unnecessary flashing.
SR: Conduct a thorough code review to identify and address the root cause of the excessive flashing in the Control Example. Implement the necessary optimizations to improve the user experience.
